products.title: Razer Book 13 Core i7 11th Gen 512GB SSD 13.4 FHD Touch Laptop
products.description: The new Razer Book 13 Laptop is a powerful slim laptop that weighs in at just 1.4Kg. This Razer Beast is powered by Intel Core i7-1165G7 Quad-Core Processor (12MB Cache, 2.80GHz up to 4.70GHz) and has 13.4 Full HD Matte 60Hz Slim side bezel Touch display with Up to 178Â° wide viewing angles. This Razer Book 13 featured with 16GB dual-channel (fixed), 512GB PCIe SSD, Intel Iris Xe Graphics. The keyboard of the laptop has Per Key RGB feature that is powered by Razer's own Razer Chroma software and adding to that, it also has Anti-Ghosting ability with Microsoft
